title: Bug 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch
description: Bug report for issue 50793 - Invalid DispatchType in ServletRequestListener on async dispatch.
OB: When a ServletRequestListener is defined and is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest is REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
EB: The expected behavior is that when a ServletRequestListener is invoked after a call to AsyncContext.dispatch(), the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest should be ASYNC.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Define a ServletRequestListener.
2. Invoke the AsyncContext.dispatch() method.
3. Verify the DispatcherType returned from the ServletRequest after the invocation of the ServletRequestListener. It should be REQUEST instead of ASYNC.
